meanings.definition: A measure of the combined effect of heat and humidity on the human body.
meanings.sent1: The humidex was high, making it difficult to stay cool.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast mentioned a high humidex for the day.
meanings.sent3: Feeling like a sweaty sponge, the humidex was not my friend.
meanings.sent4: The humidex was a relentless opponent, draining all energy.
meanings.sent5: The humidex turned the air into a thick, suffocating blanket.

meanings.definition: A scale used to determine the discomfort level caused by high humidity.
meanings.sent1: Check the humidex before planning any outdoor activities.
meanings.sent2: The humidex reading indicated it was going to be a muggy day.
meanings.sent3: The humidex seemed to mock us with its high numbers.
meanings.sent4: As the humidex climbed, so did our desire for air conditioning.
meanings.sent5: The humidex painted a picture of sticky discomfort in the forecast.
